DOC.brief_summary: Observational study support association bottle feed beyond 15 18 month age low socioeconomic status , excessive milk intake , dental caries , iron deficiency , behavioral issue obesity . Yet many parent , particularly low socioeconomic household , choose feed child bottle much beyond age . Recognizing need educational intervention bottle feeding , TARGet Kids ! Research Collaboration recently develop 5-minute bottle wean educational intervention 9 month well-child visit . We undertake pragmatic randomized control trial evaluate effectiveness involve 251 child recruit TARGet Kids ! ( PMID : 20624802 ) The goal determine whether office-based , educational intervention parent 9-month-old child could reduce bottle use iron depletion 2 year age .
DOC.brief_title: Office Based Intervention Reduce Bottle Use Toddlers : TARGet Kids ! Pragmatic Randomized Trial
